subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, in an attempt to stay in the playoff race and ignite a moribund offense, called up Conforto, a heralded 22-year-old outfield prospect, and traded for Juan Uribe and Kelly Johnson. But they lost to the Dodgers.
snippet: The Mets, in an attempt to stay in the playoff race and ignite a moribund offense, called up Conforto, a heralded 22-year-old outfield prospect, and traded for Juan Uribe and Kelly Johnson. But they lost to the Dodgers.
